ClientAttrReq.Description: CARML declaration for User and Role entities

Attribute.Description: Domain where the entity to be created
Attribute.Name: subjectdomain

Attribute.Description: Is Visible (for system/app id users/groups visible value is false)
Attribute.Name: visible
